name: Western Addition Senior Center
description: The Western Addition Senior Center, located inside the Royal Adah Arms Senior Housing building, is a place where all generations can connect with their elders and share their wisdom. Services Available: - Information/Referral - Social Services and Case Management - Nutritious Noon Meals - Always Active Exercise Classes - Arts and Crafts - Computer Lab and Classes - Whist and Dominoes - Cooking Demonstrations - Monthly Birthday Parties - Special Events
